channel.title: Recent Executive Orders
channel.description: Latest Executive Orders from the White House

item.title: Implementing The United States–Japan Agreement
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, including the International Emergency

item.title: Making Federal Architecture Beautiful Again
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1. Purpose.

item.title: Further Exclusions from the Federal Labor-Management Relations Program
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, including section 7103(b)(1) of title 5,

item.title: Taking Steps to End Cashless Bail to Protect Americans
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1. Purpose and

item.title: Measures To End Cashless Bail And Enforce The Law In The District Of Columbia
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1. Purpose and

item.title: Prosecuting Burning of The American Flag
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1. Purpose.

item.title: Additional Measures to Address the Crime Emergency in the District of Columbia
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1. Crime

item.title: Improving Our Nation Through Better Design
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1. Purpose and

item.title: Revocation of Executive Order on Competition
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1.

item.title: Enabling Competition in the Commercial Space Industry
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1. Purpose.
